name: High Rise Rush
description:
A third-person platformer, combined with the mobility of a jetpack. Use your jetpack to ascend to the top of the stage as fast as you can. Use regular jumps, jetpack forward, and jetpack up to navigate between buildings. Any use of the jetpack depletes fuel, which recharges gradually. 

Controls: 

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look
  • Space to do a normal jump
  • C to do a jetpack jump (uses fuel)
  • Left Shift to do a forward dash (uses fuel)

Credits: 

Tucker Wolfson: Level Design

Aidan O’Flaherty: Programing 

Evan Parker: Models of Player, Enemy, and Environment Objects

Kim Howland: Models for Platforms and Environment Objects
